title: Bug 35588Cannot assume that FontStruct.perchar is != 0
description: Bug 35588Cannot assume that FontStruct.perchar is != 0 There are 8 places in GC (4 in getAdvanceWidth(), 4 in getCharWidth()) where weaccess FontStruct.perchar in order to memmove an XCharStruct.These casesmust handle the possibility of this value being 0.For more info see bug 35434.
